name: Forecast
description:
A FPS game which lets you see the future and overcome your enemies.

Made in 2 days as a submission for Quarantine Jam with the theme of "Invisible Enemies"

All assets were made during the jam period (excluding those shown in the bottom of the page)

Source code : https://github.com/Will-S-Dev/Forecast-Example

How to Play The Game has no tutorial. So please read this carefully

-WASD is for Movement

-Space Key to Jump

-Left Click to Attack

-Right Click to Dash (Direction depends on which WASD key you are holding) 

Now it gets confusing

-Hold the E key to Forecast (Remember HOLD the key) (Explained more below)

So what do you do in the game?

Well in the game you fight endless waves of ninjas who throw ninja stars at you.  However these ninjas will vanish and appear only for a short while to throw the ninja stars at you. It sounds difficult right?

Well no not really. Ninjas can still be hit even when vanished so you may get lucky and slash one of them even after they vanish. Furthermore you have the Forecast ability.

This ability is activated when you hold E. Upon activation the screen turns reddish and you cannot move. You are still able to look around you and observe the enemies' movement/attack pattern. You will not take damage during this time. Once you release E, you will return to the point in time that you started your Forecast. And although not 100 percent accurate, the movement and attacks of your enemies will be similar to those you have seen in the Forecast. With this ability you can predict where and when they will reappear and strike them.

Dashing also lets you phase through the ninja stars and avoid them without taking damage.

What are you waiting for?

Now you know how to play. Go and download the game now! Make sure to leave your high score in the comments.
